issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: I have a Domain account in windows in my work, there is a proxy. I have configured HTTP, HTTPS and SOCKS settings for proxy in Window->Preferences->General->Network Connections and it is unable to update Titanium Studio. It starts connecting to https://registry.npmjs.org/titanium and in middle of process it displays an error.
fields.summary: Studio: Unable to update behind proxy authentication

comments.body: Thanks for the report. What's the error? What Studio version do you have installed? Can you post your Studio log? (Help -> Titanium Studio -> View Log File).
